dcterms:description: The BraTS dataset is a multimodal brain tumor image segmentation benchmark that provides a comprehensive set of MRI and other imaging modalities for the segmentation of brain tumors.
dcterms:title: BraTS dataset

dcterms:description: A primary cohort for model training and testing consisting of 305 patients with 864 brain metastases, including volume masks delineated by clinicians on CT and MRI scans.
dcterms:title: Primary cohort for model training and testing

dcterms:description: An additional batch of test set collected from the same institution, containing 36 patients with 96 metastases for evaluating model robustness and generalizability.
dcterms:title: Additional batch of test set
